name: cycle-tracker-backend
description: Menstrual cycle tracking application - Supabase backend

scripts.dev: echo 'Frontend development setup not yet configured'
scripts.build: echo 'Frontend build setup not yet configured'
scripts.supabase:start: cd supabase && docker-compose up -d && sleep 30 && npm run supabase:migrate && npm run supabase:seed
scripts.supabase:reset: cd supabase && docker-compose down -v && npm run supabase:start

author: Development Team
